instructions: Open the Google Podcasts app and tap the magnifying glass in the upper-left corner to search for podcasts. Select the podcast you want and tap Subscribe to add the podcast to your list of favorites. Tap Play beside an episode to start listening.

Tap Explore at the top of the RadioPublic window and search for podcasts. Select a podcast you d like to listen to, then tap Start Listening or Add to home on the podcast homepage. Tap the episode you want to download on the podcast homepage. Tap More (the three dots in the upper-right corner) and choose Download . The episode is saved to your device's internal storage.
